name: BEEP's Adventure
description:
BEEP's Adventure!

BEEP’s Adventure is a 3D, third-person puzzle game designed for PC. You play as the prototype robot BEEP who was designed by the company Box Corp. to improve the efficiency of their box making factory, although due to a flaw in your programming you’re now trying to wreak as much chaos on the factory as robotically possible. From fiddling with machinery to disrupting other robotic workers, players will feel mischievous yet satisfied after ruining the days of everyone in the Box Corp factory through a series of light-hearted, mayhem-inducing puzzles.

#adventure #puzzle #mischief #robot #cartoony #cute #chaos #robot #mayhem

Controls

W - Move forward

A - Move left

S - Move backward

D - Move right

Space bar - Jump

F - Punch

Left mouse - Pick up boxes / place boxes

Right mouse - / Throw boxes

Shift - Sprint

System Requirements:

Minimum Specifications:

CPU: i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50GHz RAM: 8GB GPU: GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2GB

Recommended Specifications:

CPU: i7-8650U @ 1.90GHz RAM: 16GB GPU: GeForce GTX 1050 Storage: 2GB
